mainBanner.title: Modern logistics solutions supported by many years of experience.

meetUs.title: Meet us
meetUs.subtitle: Grand Transport Logistics is a team of specialists dealing with forwarding and road transport throughout Europe. During our daily work, we use the latest solutions and technologies, and each transport is tailored to the individual needs of our customers. A wide fleet of our own vehicles and the possibility of providing forwarding services mean that no transport is a problem for us!

offerOne.title: Transport
offerOne.description: An extensive and modern fleet of vehicles allows us to meet the highest quality and safety standards. We operate on both the domestic and international markets, offering a wide range of transport solutions tailored to the needs of our clients.

offerTwo.title: Shipping
offerTwo.description: We are a leading company specializing in the comprehensive organization of road transport throughout Europe.  Regardless of the type of cargo, our company effectively handles both groupage and FTL shipments.
